title: easy
text:
we took the hop on hop off bus from the cruise port.
Took us right to the Acropolis and back.
No worry, super easy.

title: Wow!
text:
A must see when in Athens.
$20.00 euros each to get in , but worth the money.
Hard to explain the size of the building, and how it was ever made.

title: must do
text:
quick way to get to the top of the mountain to Thera.
great views.
the line ups look long, but it goes fast.

title: very interrsting
text:
very cool walking street in Close to the harbour where the cruise ships come in.
neat shops, and friendly people.

title: fast!!
text: used the drive thru for coffee in the morning a few times, even if it looks busy, it`s very fast. Great coffee.

title: What happened to the food!
text:
My wife , her sister, and my daughter went for dinner before the Many Hats show.
The food was not good.
My wife and her sister had gnoochi. It was dry and tasteless.
My wife told the server, and ordered a small nachos. The nachos were no better.
We have eaten here before and it was very good, what happened?
Even when my wife complained, they only gave her a discount, even when she didn`t eat the meal. Should have taken it off the bill. Will not eat there again, we will go elsewhere before the Many Hats Show.

title: excellent food!
text:
Great lunch buffet. Good selection, fresh, and flavorful.
Staff are friendly. Enjoy a chai tea, and dessert from the buffet too.
Been there lots, and love it.

title: Full service rv resort.
text:
Full hook ups, indoor and outdoor pools, 2 indoor hot tubs, one out door hot tub.
Good internet($) Convenience store, Propane sales. Great stop over on the way to the coast or to the ok valley. We stayed 4 nights an had a great time.
Highway is a little noisy, but nothing really bad. Will stay again.

title: Pepperoni
text:
Best pepperoni , and the best price.
Try it , you will love it.
Best in Penticton b.c.
Parking is a little tricky, but worth the effort.

title: Quiet, and clean.
text:
We stayed for 2 nights, and found it to be very quiet and clean.
The people running the campground were very nice. We have a class-c rv , and found the site nice and level and the water , power , and sewer hookups were in the proper place. Would stay here again next trip.

title: ver nice
text: Nice level sites for your rv. Nice grounds, and a small lake. (large pond). Great wood carving. Nice and quiet. Friendly office staff. Would stay here again next trip.Nice and close to the ferry terminal, to Powell River.

title: Okay for a stop over
text:
Nothing special about this rv resort. Lots of full timer here. Staff were ok, but didn`t give a great welcoming feeling. sites were nice and level. would look else were next time thru.
WiFi didn`t work very well.

title: Amazing to see.
text: A must see when in Powell River. Not far from downtown. Good viewing pull out. Easy to get to. Just an awesome thing to see all these old boats used as a break water.

title: okay for a night
text: Sites have no privacy here, no fences,or bushes between the sites. Its just a plain campground, nothing special. Staff were friendly. The grounds need some tlc to make it more comfortable. Would stay else where next time.

title: Must see when on the island.
text: You must stop and see this place. The store has everthing! Goats on the roof are cool to see. Staff were very good in all the stores. Try the donuts,, they were the best ever.
place: Old Country Market - Goats on Roof

title: Noisy!
text: This campground is right next to the 101 highway. Very noisy all day long. The campground is ok, but could use more attention. The staff were very nice. The pool was a nice touch. Washrooms and showers were ok, but again could use more attention. Would most likely look for a quieter campground next time.
place: The Creekside Campground and RV Park

title: Nice goverment campground
text: need to reserve to get in here. Nice private sites. Ocean is right there, with a good beach. kids play area, washrooms and showers,

title: Just ok.
text:
Sites are very close together, and ours was not level. Just an an average campground.
We only spent 2 nights, and that was enough. We thought that this being right on the lake that it would have been a lot nicer, but we a little disappointed. We have been at private rv / camprounds at are looked after much better , and they don`t have the location that Bambury has.The location is excellent, right on Skaha Lake.

title: Beautiful property
text:
We stayed for two nights, and were very impressed. The grounds were very well kept, and the location was perfect. We had our grand daughters with us, and they loved the water park, and the games room. Sites were flat, and a nice size to accommodate our rv. The full service hook ups were in the right place for an rv.
The owners were the friendly and totally accommodating. Being right on the river was nice. There was a walk way down to the sandy beach. We will be coming here again.

title: Great small museum.
text: Interesting small museum of the mine in Hedley. Cute little coffee shop and store in the building. Must see when stopping in Hedly.

title: Very Nice
text: First time at this campground, and won`t be the last. The Owners were extremely nice when we showed up. The campground was very well kept, and the spaces were a good size, and fairly flat so you don`t have to level your unit. Washroom were nice and clean, and have showers. There is a path down to the river, where there are spots to set up your chairs and soak up the sun. There are full hook up spots, but they also have a sani dump available on the property. We will be visiting this park again in the near future.
place: Gold Mountain RV Park and Cabins

title: Beautiful Campground
text:
Stayed 5 nights on our tour of the Sunshine Coast.
Beautiful, quiet camp ground. Large clean camp sights. Camp sites are a nice distance from one another for privacy. Park operator was very nice. Sani- dump available in the park, is a nice touch, wish all the provincial parks had sani-dumps.
Will stay here again on our next tours of the coast.

title: Beach Combers
text: A must see when you are in Gibsons B.C.. If you were a fan of the Beach Combers show in the 70`s, you have to visit, just to say you were there. We stopped in for a dessert and coffee. Both were excellent.

title: Nice Location
text:
Nice campground. Nice and quiet. Great location for doing day trips.
Camping spots were nice and clean and flat. Price was pretty good.
Don`t let the full time trailers at the front of the campground sway you, the rest of the campground is nice. Great little ice cream hut with a viewing deck of the river.
I would return again.

title: History
text: Nice to see, but a very small attraction, only takes about 1/2 hours to see it.Ok if you are passing by, but really not worth to plan your day around.

title: You goota eat here!
text:
We always eat here when we are in downtown Disney.
The sugar Cinnamon Pretzel is the best! Great for a snack, or make it a full dinner with the Wetzel Dog, cinnamon sugar pretzel, and a lemonade.

title: Yummy!!
text:
Nice ice cream soda shop in California Adventure.
A little pricey for a family.
Excellent tasty stuff.
place: Ghirardelli Soda Fountain and Chocolate Shop

title: Great Location
text:
Stayed at the Cortona Inn and suites for 4 nights.
The Hotel is a Disney Good neighbour hotel.
Beds were really comfy, and the room was clean and quiet.
Staff was friendly, and the free breakfast was very good.
Pool was nice and clean and towels were provided at the pool.
Would stay here again.

title: Hampton Quality
text:
Nice clean hotel. Staff were friendly. Great location on Gasoline Alley. Breakfast was good. Rate was excellent for this quality of a hotel.
You can`t go wrong with a Hilton Hotel. Free parking is a plus.
place: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Red Deer

title: Not your average Museum
text: Very nice museum . Well done. You could spend all day there. There is even a place in the museum that you can watch the people chipping the bones out of the rocks. Very interesting.

title: Great location
text: Right on the main road into Banff. Excellent location. Hotel was clean and the staff were nice. We went to 3 or 4 hotels on the road to check prices, and the Banff Inn was the best price. Breakfast was included, and was fine for a quick bite. I would stay here again next time in Banff.

title: Just ok
text: Always see the commercials on t.v. and Thought we`d try Chilies for the first time. It was ok. Nothing special. Food was fine. Service was ok. Would I go back??? maybe.

title: Great Coffee
text:
Great coffee. The food is very good. The prices are reasonable.
The patio could be spruced up a bit, but the restaurant is cosy.
Restaurant is a little tight when its busy, but its a popular place.
Staff is friendly.

title: Amazing
text: Super busy place. Always a wait list. Check to see if there is space at the bar. When we went up to put our name on the list there was a sign on the desk saying that there was room at the bar for immediate seating. We took the seats and they were better than the tables, more room, you can see everything, and the service was quicker. The food was excellent, and well priced. Very interesting place, sort of like Rain forest café, but with dinosaurs. The staff were very nice.

title: Cool show
text: Excellent water fireworks show. Get a fast pass for the show for good seats. Make sure you dress warm in the winter months . When the sun goes down, it cools off real quick.

title: Disney Style
text:
We stayed in the Lion King section of the resort. The suite we had was amazing. Lots of room, separate bedroom, Living room, Dining table, Fridge, microwave, Coffee maker, Lots of extra pillows, pull out sofa, Murphy bed, Two full bathrooms.(wifi worked excellent) Décor was fun in the lion King theme.( could sleep 6 easily)
Lion King section is close to the big pool and the food court. The grounds around all the sections are well kept and fun to look at with all the movie caricatures bigger than life. The food court is super busy, but the service is quick. There is a great selection of food and the quality is good. (try the pizza) The Magic band work perfect for getting into your room and the theme parks.
The bus system is amazing!!!!!!!!! I can`t say enough about it. Any time you want to go to and from the parks or to downtown Disney there`s a bus within 5-10 min. All the staff we met were very nice and very helpful. The complementary airport Magic bus is very convenient.

title: Location, Location
text: Beautiful hotel right on Robson Street for shopping and restaurants Very clean Friendly staff Great breakfast Nice work our room Great views of Vancouver from the hot tub. Close to all of what Vancouver has to offer.

title: Beautiful Hotel
text:
We stayed at this hotel before going on our cruise, and for a couple of days after our cruise.
It has the perfect location.
We walked to the cruise port, because it was that close.
Close to everything you need in San Diego.
Beautiful hotel, Great staff, wonderful pool area.
Hotel was very clean and in excellent shape.
Very close to the airport too, ( $17.00 cab ride, including tip )

title: Very cool.
text:
We stayed in San Diego for 3 nights.
Our Hotel was right by the Seaport Village.
It is the coolest place, right on the water. Lots of stores and restaurants to close from.
There is a historical carousel on the property too ( very nicely preserved )
All the staff in the stores seem very nice.

title: Excellent food
text:
Great food and deco. You will think you are in Greece.
Prices are good for the quality of the food.
Service is always, friendly and attentive.
A must when you visit Penticton.
It`s a local favorite. Ask for a table neat the fireplace when you visit in the fall or winter.

title: Nice New Place
text:
Cool new pizza place,
Good pizza.
Great service.
Needs a little more to give it that wow factor.
Good for lunch.

title: Good old Bostons
text:
Very nice décor, and excellent service.
Food was very good. Pasta was excellent, and my wifes pizza was very ggod.
Prices are typical Bostons,, quite affordable.
Nice that it is attached to the Hotel, super convenient, when passing thru town.

title: Beautiful resturant
text:
We stopped in for a quick lunch.
Had the nachos, which were excellent.
The restaurant is very cool.
We ate out on the patio.
Service was very good.
Price was average.
Will definitely go there for dinner one evening.

title: good old Mr. Mikes
text: Not bad. Mike burger was good. Very busy restaurant . Décor is old and needs updateing, but not bad. Service was good.

title: There`s gold in this here town,
text: Wow!!! Very cool old gold rush town. Lots of old buildings to see. Nice to see the employees in costume. All the people working there are really nice. Lots of shopping.

title: nice hotel
text:
Nice clean hotel.
Good food at the Boston Pizza is attached.
Friendly staff.
Very good price.
Free Wi-Fi
Lots of free parking.
Easy hyway access.
Free hot breakfast with scrambled eggs bacon, sausage,ceral,bread for toast Coffee,tea juice.
Complimentry newpapers at breakfast.

title: home made food
text:
Excellent value for your dollar.
Great tasting food.
Fab desserts
Happy service
Nice clean restaurant
Worth the drive off the hyway into Hope.

title: The way to see a show
text: Beautiful new theater. The seating if theater style, so, everyone has a great view of the screen. It seems no matter where you sit, the viewing is excellent. It is always cleaned between each show. Food is not cheap, but the popcorn is the best I`ve had. (worth the money). HINT: date night is Tuesday, show prices are much better.

title: Hawaii in B.C.
text: Beautiful sandy beach. The city grooms it every morning in the summer. Promonade was just re-done this winter(2013), and it turned out very nice. Very popular walking spot year round. Water is nice and warm in the summer, and very clean. A must when visiting Penticton.

title: opa!!!!
text:
Excellent food, Excellent service, Great décor.
Nice menu with a god variety of choices.
Tasty food, never had a bad meal.

title: Fresh & Friendly
text:
We went for lunch. Had a single cheese burger with mushrooms and fried onions, and a med fries.
The burger was one of the best I have ever had. The fries were fresh made and again some of the best I have had.
The service was friendly and the restaurant was clean.
I would recommend this as one of the best burger joints around.

title: good fastfood
text: great new burgers, excellent fries, and the best rootbeer. The new décor is very nice. Staff is friendly.

title: great pasta
text:
went in for lunch, and what a deal,, pasta luch for $5.00.
Food was very good. Service was very good. Resturant was clean.
We will return for sure.

title: well done!
text:
Very nicely done. Large koi, and beautiful grounds. Best of all,,,, it`s free.
Great setting right by the art gallery, and the lake. A must see when in Penticton.

title: great indian food
text:
was there for lunch,,,$7.95 , and it was excellent.
was there for dinner $29.99 for 2,, and it was again excellent.
Décor is not bad, and the service is friendly. For good indian food,, try it.

title: Excellent EI food
text:
Been to this restaurant a couple of times when we go to Vancouver.
Food is the best Indian food I have had in a restaurant.
Service is casual and very friendly.
Restaurant is nice and clean.
Try it,,, you will like it.

title: WORTH THE DISNEY ADMISSION PRICE ALONE
text:
All I can say is, that this is worth the price of admission price alone,
All done in Disney style.
When in Disneyland you have to see it.
Go the the spot early to get a good spot. Right in front of the entrance to The Pirates of the Caribbean is really good.

title: Great Park in a large city
text: Stanley Park is always a must go to when we are in Vancouver. We have been there tons of times and will always go back, even to just drive around the park. The sea wall is a very nice walk. Visit the Aquarium when you are there, It is quite amazing. Love it.

title: Fun place
text:
Always interesting to visit.
Always a fun place to visit when in Vancouver b.c.
Public Market is very cool to see, with lots of food vendors to close from for lunch. Tons of veggie, fruit, and meat vendors too. We usually go to the Keg for dinner then to the live theater at the Arts Club.

title: Beautiful view!!
text:
Always great food
Always clean
Always great service
Always a great view of the lake.
Need I say more?
You have to try it.
